Mohamad Daaeboul
Developer


View My Work

As a Java Backend developer, my portfolio includes

a diverse range of projects and expertise in creating robust and efficient backend solutions using Java and related technologies.

E-commerce Platform

Description: Developed a scalable and high-performance e-commerce platform using Java, Spring Boot, and Hibernate. Implemented features such as user authentication, product catalog management, shopping cart functionality, order processing, and integration with payment gateways.

RESTful API Development

Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for a mobile application using Java, Spring Framework, and JAX-RS. Developed endpoints for user registration, authentication, data retrieval, and CRUD operations on various entities. Ensured security and data validation by implementing JWT-based authentication and input validation.

Database Optimization

Optimized the performance of a Java-based application by analyzing and tuning database queries. Utilized indexing, caching, query optimization techniques, and connection pooling to improve response times and reduce database load.

Testing and Continuous Integration

Implemented automated testing using JUnit, Mockito, and Selenium for a Java application. Integrated the testing process with continuous integration tools like Jenkins or GitLab CI/CD, enabling regular build and test cycles for faster feedback and improved code quality.

My Creative Process

All of my Projects involves several steps that help in designing, developing, and delivering robust and efficient software solutions.

1

Requirements Gathering

Understand project requirements and gather necessary information from stakeholders.

2

Design and Development

Create a high-level system design, select appropriate technologies, and implement the backend system using Java and relevant frameworks.

3

Testing and Refinement

Perform unit and integration testing, fix bugs, optimize performance, and ensure code quality.

4

Deployment and Maintenance

Prepare the application for production, set up servers and databases, monitor performance, and regularly maintain and update the system.
